column1: Uchi////So much to say I don't even know where to begin. Customer service 10/10 ALWAYS. Cassandra is an amazing hostess first and foremost
column2: I felt genuinely taken care of by her the entire time
column3: she also had AMAZING suggestions in terms of the menu. Chef Daniel Sun was also amazing and very informative. Uchi
column4: thank you for an excellent time and incredible experience.
